message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.RO, cs.MM, cs.LG. 

The paper proposes a CNN-based approach for multi-camera markerless motion capture of the human body, which involves computer vision (CV) techniques for pose estimation, graphics (GR) for 3D modeling, robotics (RO) for motion capture, multimedia (MM) for image processing, and machine learning (LG) for training models. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.CV, followed by cs.GR, cs.RO, cs.MM, and cs.LG.
